name: Cerebrum 2021
description:
Cerebrum 2021

  • Game best played with someone else this is a co-op game
  • you are brain cells controlling a man escaping a dungeon
  • stimulate parts of his brain to make him do different actions (drop bomb, swing sword, use shield, & interact with nearby objects)
  • try and get the highest score possible
  • doors can be opened if you have collected keys

Controls

Player1: WASD & E

Player2: Aroowkeys & right shift

:)
